name: RDP Unauthorized Session Mitigation Playbook
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an unauthorized remote session was established through RDP, leading to executable commands on a corporate workstation.

action--54cbaca9-d24b-4e60-bf71-9594d8bc.name: Terminate unauthorized RDP session
action--54cbaca9-d24b-4e60-bf71-9594d8bc.description: Terminate the remote desktop session from the unauthorized IP address.

commands.command: net session | findstr /I <Bad_IP> | for /f "tokens=2" %s in ('findstr /I <Bad_IP> net session') do logoff %s

action--f193e2a1-df6e-4d35-abfa-43f8b1ee.name: Change affected user passwords
action--f193e2a1-df6e-4d35-abfa-43f8b1ee.description: Update the passwords for all affected accounts to prevent further unauthorized access.

action--9a065b0e-09e6-4c12-a0f0-37e0b160.name: Disable RDP access for affected host
action--9a065b0e-09e6-4c12-a0f0-37e0b160.description: Block RDP access on the affected host to prevent further remote access.

commands.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Block RDP" protocol=tcp dir=in localport=3389 action=block
